page.title: 13ATTITUDES IN BOOTHBY PAGNELL
page.content: An old lady told us that on the left side of Main Street there was not a public footpath and this causes problems because the school bus drops off the school children there and it is very dangerous.There is only one public telephone box and there could be more. They would like some local shops,eg.a Greengrocer.There is a mobile library which comes around once a fortnight and if you want the Midland's mobile bank to come to visit you then it will stop.Otherwise it will just go on to Ingolsby.
